content.question: Which of the following statements is an example of Existentialist thought?

choices.label: "Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it."
"All are born free and everywhere all are in chains."
"Comrades, we must abolish the cult of the individual decisively, once and for all."
"A person is the sum of his or her acts."

content.answer: "A person is the sum of his or her acts."

topic.text: 9.14: 20th- and 21st-Century Culture, Arts, and Demographic Trends

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
